title: Crash
vulnerability_information:
1) Settings -> Preferences -> Print 

2) insert to "Left part" field of "Header" block  A*500 (Full string for paste consist in poc.txt)

3) Click "Add"

4) Crash 
Crash info:
(1c8.2dd8): Unknown exception - code c000041d (!!! second chance !!!)
*** ERROR: Module load completed but symbols could not be loaded for npp.exe
rax=0000006872865ac8 rbx=0000006872865cf0 rcx=00007ff6bbf0c780
rdx=0000000000000000 rsi=0000006872865800 rdi=0000006872865800
rip=00007ffc38c0a388 rsp=0000006872865fb0 rbp=00000068728660f0
 r8=00007ffc3c2f6e2e  r9=0000000000000000 r10=00007ffc3c20c48a
r11=0000000000000000 r12=00000000000001f3 r13=0000000000030c70
r14=0000006872866130 r15=00000068728fe388
iopl=0         nv up ei pl nz na pe nc
cs=0033  ss=002b  ds=002b  es=002b  fs=0053  gs=002b             efl=00000200
KERNELBASE!RaiseException+0x68:
00007ffc`38c0a388 488b8c24c0000000 mov     rcx,qword ptr [rsp+0C0h] ss:00000068`72866070=0000dbf840d0cbfd




Notepad++ v7.6.3   (64-bit)
Build time : Jan 27 2019 - 17:16:47
Path : C:\Program Files\Notepad++\notepad++.exe
Admin mode : OFF
Local Conf mode : OFF
OS : Windows 10 (64-bit)
Plugins : DSpellCheck.dll mimeTools.dll NppConverter.dll 


full gebug info and poc.txt in attach

## Impact

Crash

activities.message:
Hello @k00r,

Your time and effort in submitting this report are much appreciated, however, we need you to provide us with more information in each report as to what function is failing and why so we can proceed.

Regards,
@nasr0x01

All debug information about problem added in attach of issue(debug_info.txt).If you want, i can duplicate part of this information to comments.

activities.message:
Hello @k00r,

Thank you for your submission! I was able to validate your report, and have submitted it to the appropriate remediation team for review. They will let us know the final ruling on this report, and when/if a fix will be implemented. Please note that the status and severity are subject to change.

Regards,
@nasr0x01
activities.markdown_message:

activities.message:
Hello @k00r,

Thank you for your report. This has been validated by the Notpad++ team and will now be sent to the European Commission for final approval to pay out a bounty. We appreciate your patience and will update you as soon as we hear back but there may be some delay.

Regards,
@nasr0x01
activities.markdown_message:

activities.message:
Hello @k0o0r,

Thank you for this report. The team have confirmed your vulnerability as a Low severity impact.

The H1 platform doesn’t allow €URO payments, hence the funky $284.47 amount.

The USD$ conversion for today is 1 United States Dollar equals 0.88 Euro.

Thanks for your help and participating in this program.

Kind Regards
HackerOne

activities.message:
Hi @k0o0r, 

Thanks for submitting this report. We have determined that this report is now resolved. If you’re still able to reproduce this issue, please let us know and we will investigate further. 

Thanks!
